chinese: 我写这封信/邮件是为了做某事
english: I am writing this letter/email to do something
Details with regard to something are presented below

chinese: 首先，活动将于2025年5月24日在图书馆前举行
english: Firstly, the event will take place on May 24, 2025 in front of the library

chinese: 它的特点是有几项活动，以加深参与者对XXX的理解
english: It is characterized by several activities so as to deepen attendees' understanding of XXX

chinese: 其次，参与者将有机会做某事，这将使他们能够探索新领域并扩展知识范围
english: Secondly, the participants will have the opportunity to do something, which will enable them to explore new areas and expand their scope of knowledge

chinese: 第三，团体拍照环节将被安排，使这个场合更难忘
english: Thirdly, a team photo session will be organized to make the occasion more unforgettable

chinese: 他的影响不仅深远而且影响广泛，塑造了跨越世代的人们的思想、信仰和行为
english: His influence is not only profound but also far-reaching, shaping the thoughts, beliefs and actions of people across generations

chinese: 使它与众不同的是它巨大的价值，以及它在世界上的崇高地位
english: What distinguishes it from others is its immense values, together with its high status in the world

chinese: 如果你有任何问题，请随时告诉我
english: If you have any questions, please feel free to let me know
